platforms.name: NumPyro

platforms.name: torchaudio
platforms.description: Audio processing library for PyTorch providing I/O, popular datasets, and common audio transformations for building audio applications.

platforms.name: Implicit
platforms.description: Fast Python implementation of collaborative filtering for implicit feedback datasets using matrix factorization algorithms.

platforms.name: torch (R)
